Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hoggy Missions is a part of the vast Hoggy Universe, now available for free on Alexa to help kids stay at home while having fun.

Hoggy is a cute piggy alien that has come from planet Hoggyland to seek help from a Superhero on Earth. Kids get a chance to be a superhero by helping Hoggy on Missions to save Hoggyland from the evil 'Naruko'. Kids participate in highly engaging & interactive missions by being a part of the story and performing actions to move forward in the mission.

Alongside fun &good habits, kids also get educational learning- For ex. when they unlock Magical doors by speaking the correct spelling of 'Ice-cream'.

Keep your kids busy while you work & rest peacefully.

How to go on Missions-
1. Start with 'Hoggy Missions'
2. Follow instructions, try to perform actions as Hoggy tells, to move forward in Missions.

Hoggy Missions are Pretend Play, where the kid uses his/her imagination to imagine the world and uses relatable household objects to perform actions in the Mission- Like using a Pencil Eraser as Magic Stones for attacking evil Naruko with Magic, Climbing on the bed to avoid hot Molten Lava or hiding behind the curtains to hide from Naruko's bodyguards.
